note:
This account offers a mix of human & AI curated #uspolitics stories from around the web.  Priority topics: Climate, Labor, Economy, Fascism, LGBT+, Internet regulation. #politics 

Some stories are automatically picked up because of high interest on social media.

An AI model helps make decisions on story quality and creates hashtags, formatting, and summaries.

Send feedback and concerns to @cybermancy

Based in Richmond, Virginia, USA.
